lead_paragraph: Power won the Grand Prix of Indianapolis for his first IndyCar victory of the season, leading 65 of 82 laps on the road course at Indianapolis Motor Speedway.

headline.print_headline: Will Power Gains First IndyCar Win of Season
headline.main: Will Power Gains First IndyCar Win of Season

snippet: Power won the Grand Prix of Indianapolis for his first IndyCar victory of the season, leading 65 of 82 laps on the road course at Indianapolis Motor Speedway.
abstract: Will Power wins Grand Prix of Indianapolis, his first IndyCar victory of season.
